Publish.LongDescription:
### Dispatch Boss
Scale **fleet sizes** and **vehicle capacities** in: all Public Transit, Industry, Cargo stations, and Parks/Roads Maintenance. New: includes Transit Line Slider vehicle increases.
### What it does
- **Transit depots**: change max vehicles per depot (Bus, Tram, Train, Subway) - **Passengers**: change seats per vehicle (Bus, Tram, Train, Subway, Ship, Ferry, Airplane) - **Industry Deliveries**: scale cargo capacity for delivery vehicles (Semi trucks, Delivery vans, Motorbike delivery, Raw materials trucks) - **Extractor + cargo fleet**: scale max fleet for extractor transport companies + cargo stations (harbor/train/airport cargo) - **Parks + Roads**: maintenance fleet size / work shift / rate + road wear speed (alpha) - **Road wear speed (alpha)**: scale how fast roads accumulate wear over time - Optional: **expand Transit Line in-game vehicle slider limits** (min can reduce to only (1) vehicle on most routes; maximums are also increased)
### Notes 🚍🚋🚆✈️🚢 - **Sliders** adjust any time, no restart needed. - Supports switching cities. - Transit lines: expanded limits still follow the game’s **route cycle time** (travel time + stops); slider gets higher maximums, but still varies per line (due to game's formula). - Depot capacity = maximum number of vehicles a single depot can maintain/spawn (does not scale extension buildings). - Avoid other depot/passenger capacity mods to avoid conflicts (they override each other). - No Harmony or Reflection; more compatible - less likely to break with game updates. - Safe to remove any time (use Reset buttons to return to vanilla game default values).
## 11 Languages
- English, Français, Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Polski Polish, Português Brazilian - 한국어, 日本語, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese), 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese
